name: Applying for a business credit card

testSteps.description: Given Bill owns a business with an annual profit of $200000
And a credit score category of Excellent
When Bill applies for a Credit Card

children.description: Bill applies for a credit card of type Business, having a credit score of Excellent and income of 200000

testSteps.description: Then he should be proposed a Gold Credit Card package with a limit of $5000

userStory.narrative:
In order to purchase items I want sooner
  As a bank customer
  I would like to apply for a credit card to suit my personal needs

  Different types of credit cards are available, including Personal Credit Cards, Business Credit Cards, and Executive Credit Cards

title: Applying for a business credit card
